Highborn.description: Highborn Faen are shaped by echoes of ancient cities and lost empires. They move with practiced elegance, bearing the memories of civilization's triumphs and failings alike.

abilities.name: Urban Resonance
abilities.description: Gain advantage when interacting with complex social or political structures.

abilities.name: Memory of Stone
abilities.description: +2 to Endure rolls while in constructed environments (cities, ruins, fortresses).

cantrip.description: You know one cantrip of your choice. Lore is your ability for casting it.

Wildborn.description: Wildborn Faen are the breath of untamed forests, singing rivers, and endless plains. Their instincts are sharper than memory, rooted in the living pulse of the wild world.

abilities.name: Rooted Stride
abilities.description: Move through difficult terrain without penalty.

abilities.name: Beastwhisper
abilities.description: Gain advantage when communicating with or calming natural beasts.

Darkborn.description: Darkborn Faen forsook the surface long ago, carving a new existence in the endless Deep Roads. Shadows cling to them like old memories, and their souls thrum with the silence of forgotten things.

abilities.name: Shadowmeld
abilities.description: +2 to Veiling rolls while in dim light or darkness.

abilities.name: Silent Memory
abilities.description: Immune to basic mind-reading or detection magic probing for surface thoughts.
